group_1.narration: Why I was turned into an [textBlue:Uwasa]...
It all happened when I came to@Kamihama to search for [textBlue:Rumors].

group_1.textCenter: (The source of the magic they called a@[textBlue:Rumor] is most likely right here...)
(It looks like it's just a ruined old museum,@but I can't be too careful.)
(I will get to the bottom of whatever this@[textBlue:Rumor] thing is.)

group_1.textLeft: I must admit, I'm surprised. You found this@place just by sensing the magic.
I see the fame of Mitakihara's veteran@Magical Girl has not been exaggerated.
Please calm down. I'm not your enemy.
I'm a Magical Girl, just like you. My name@is Mifuyu Azusa.

group_1.textRight: It seems you know all about me. So this@just feels like an ambush.

group_1.textLeft: All I know about you is what I've heard.
You're a Mitakihara veteran Magical Girl@who's been coming to Kamihama lately.
You're also quite capable. That's all I know.
It appears what I was told wasn't an @exaggeration.

group_1.textRight: So? What are you doing here?
It certainly doesn't look like you were@just passing by or anything.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm, that's a good question...[chara:100601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.3][chara:100601:cheek_0][chara:100601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:100601:lipSynch_1] Preparing@for the future, you could say.
And... I thought you just might come by.
So I suppose you could say that I was waiting@for you.

group_1.textRight: If you've got something to say, just say it.

group_1.textLeft: I'll get right to the point, then.
I came to scout you.
It seems like you don't know the truth about@Magical Girls just yet.
But based on how strong you are, I thought@that if you lent us a hand...
Then we could almost definitely achieve@liberation much more quickly.
So I discussed it with the Magius, and we@decided if you really were that strong...
Then we'd recruit you into our group.

group_1.textRight: I don't have any idea what this liberation@you speak of is...
But it sounds like whatever you're doing, @it's certainly no good.
I wonder why that could be...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, but that's not the case at all.

group_1.textRight: Are all the things happening in Kamihama@your doing?

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm. I can't deny that.

group_1.textRight: I don't have even the slightest intention of@allying myself with evil!

group_1.textLeft: That's not what this is. We're acting on@behalf of all Magical Girls.
If you'd just listen to me, I'm sure you'll@approve of what we're doing.

group_1.textRight: (She's trying to mislead me with her silver@tongue and knock me off my guard...)
I refuse! I can't trust you!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, come now... Don't be like that.
It's too soon to refuse anything.
First look into my memories, and then decide.

group_1.textRight: What's going on? Where am I?!

group_1.textLeft: Now, let's get started.
This is the truth about Magical Girls that@you don't know.

group_1.narration: The truth about Magical Girls.@And the cruelty of the entire arrangement.
